subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The day before the Netherlands defeated Australia, 3-2, Coach Louis van Gaal said his team’s rout of Spain in a Cup opener was “just a first step.”
snippet: The day before the Netherlands defeated Australia, 3-2, Coach Louis van Gaal said his team’s rout of Spain in a Cup opener was “just a first step.”
